definition: to repay/to pay off a debt
to repay/to compensate for/to recompense/to fulfill (hopes etc)
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: Next he undertook to pay off Godwin's debts.
sentences.chinese: 接下來他着手償清戈德溫的債務。

sentences.english: He is also considering whether to raise the consumption tax to help pay for the clean-up.
sentences.chinese: 他也正在考慮要不要提高消費稅來幫助償清債務。

sentences.english: The comprehensive insurance will cover all of the debts.
sentences.chinese: 全險業務將替你償清所有債務。

sentences.english: When Ciano faced the firing- squad he paid his debts to the full.
sentences.chinese: 當齊亞諾面對行刑隊時，他完全償清了他的債。
